description: ZVI files are created by AxioVision, a program used to capture images from a Zeiss microscope. The software not only allows you to capture images but also to analyze the properties of materials' structures. You can also export ZVI images to .JPG , .TIF , .TGA , .PNG , .AVI , .MOV , .CMP , .J2K , and .BMP files. AxioVision is mainly used in the scientific field by metallurgists.
